mapper.sql:
FROM infrCodeGroup a WHERE 1=1
AND a.ifcgDelNy = 1 AND a.ifcgDelNy = 0
AND a.ifcgName LIKE concat('%',#{shIfcgName},'%')
AND a.ifcgName LIKE concat('%',#{shValue},'%') AND a.ifcgNameEng LIKE concat('%',#{shValue},'%')
mapper.select:
SELECT a.ifcgSeq , a.ifcgName , a.ifcgNameEng , a.ifcgDelNy
ORDER BY ifcgSeq DESC limit #{startRnumForMysql}, #{rowNumToShow}
SELECT a.ifcgSeq , a.ifcgName , a.ifcgDelNy FROM infrCodeGroup a WHERE 1=1 AND ifcgSeq = #{ifcgSeq}
mapper.update: UPDATE infrCodeGroup SET ifcgDelNy = 1 WHERE 1=1 AND ifcgSeq = #{ifcgSeq}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM infrCodeGroup WHERE 1=1 AND ifcgSeq = #{ifcgSeq}
mapper.select: SELECT a.ifcdSeq , a.ifcdName , a.ifcdDelNy FROM infrCode a WHERE 1=1 AND a.ifcdDelNy = 0 AND ifcgSeq = #{shIfcgSeq} order by a.ifcgSeq, ifcdOrder
SELECT a.ifcdSeq , a.ifcdName , a.ifcdDelNy FROM infrCode a WHERE 1=1 AND a.ifcdSeq = #{ifcdSeq}
SELECT ifcdSeq , ifcdName , ifcgSeq FROM infrCode WHERE 1=1 AND ifcdDelNy = 0 AND ifcdUseNy = 1
